presentation.title: Your student association
presentation.subtitle: We are the voice of the students of the University of Hearst, present on three separate campuses to support you throughout your university journey.

card.one: A dynamic student organization that represents and defends the interests of all students across our three campuses, creating a strong and supportive community.
card.second: To be the bridge between students and university administration, to organize enriching events, and to ensure that every student voice is heard and respected.
card.three: To tangibly improve student life through targeted initiatives, accessible support services, and a vibrant community that fosters the personal growth of each individual.

goal.title: What we do for you
goal.subtitle: Concrete actions every day to improve your university experience.

card.one: We are your voice to the administration, defending your interests and concerns in all university decision-making bodies.
card.second: Tutoring programs, methodology workshops, exam assistance, and resources to help you succeed in your studies under the best possible conditions.
card.three: Organizing social, cultural, and sporting events to enrich your university life and create unforgettable memories.
card.four: Protecting your student rights, assisting with administrative procedures, and providing support in case of difficulties.

members.title: Meet the members of the association
members.subtitle: A passionate and dedicated team working every day to improve your student experience.

card.one: We are your voice to the administration, defending your interests and concerns in all university decision-making bodies.
card.second: Tutoring programs, methodology workshops, exam help, and resources to help you succeed in your studies under the best possible conditions.
card.three: Organizing social, cultural, and sporting events to enrich your university life and create unforgettable memories.
card.four: Protecting your student rights, assisting with administrative procedures, and providing support in case of difficulties.

president.description: A business administration student, Sophie is passionate about student engagement.

vice_president.description: Responsible for strategic partnerships and collaborations.

secretaire.description: Organized and meticulous, she coordinates activities.

tresorerie.description: A computer science student, he organizes technology events.
